washing_recommendations.Acrylic: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, mild detergent, no bleach, tumble dry low.
washing_recommendations.Artificial_fur: Hand wash cold or dry clean only. Do not machine wash.
washing_recommendations.Artificial_leather: Wipe with damp cloth. Do not wash or bleach.
washing_recommendations.Blended: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, mild detergent, no bleach.
washing_recommendations.Chenille: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, air dry preferred.
washing_recommendations.Corduroy: Machine wash cold, inside out, air dry to prevent shrinking.
washing_recommendations.Cotton: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, mild detergent, no bleach, tumble dry low.
washing_recommendations.Crepe: Hand wash cold or dry clean. No bleach. Line dry.
washing_recommendations.Denim: Machine wash cold, inside out, with like colors, air dry.
washing_recommendations.Felt: Hand wash cold, reshape and dry flat. No machine.
washing_recommendations.Fleece: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, no fabric softener, air dry.
washing_recommendations.Leather: Professional leather clean only. Do not wash.
washing_recommendations.Linen: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, air dry, iron while damp.
washing_recommendations.Lut: Hand wash cold, mild detergent, line dry.
washing_recommendations.Nylon: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, no bleach, air dry.
washing_recommendations.Polyester: Machine wash warm, permanent press, mild detergent, tumble dry low.
washing_recommendations.Satin: Hand wash cold or dry clean. No wringing.
washing_recommendations.Silk: Dry clean or hand wash cold with silk detergent, line dry in shade.
washing_recommendations.Suede: Brush gently or professional clean. Do not wash.
washing_recommendations.Terrycloth: Machine wash warm, tumble dry medium, no bleach.
washing_recommendations.Unclassified: Test a small area first. Use cold water, gentle cycle.
washing_recommendations.Utilities: Machine wash cold, durable press, air dry.
washing_recommendations.Velvet: Dry clean only. Do not machine wash.
washing_recommendations.Viscose: Hand wash cold, mild detergent, line dry, no wringing.
washing_recommendations.Wool: Hand wash cold or dry clean. Reshape and dry flat.
